context: Analyze this prone backbend pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Upward-Facing Dog (Urdhva Mukha Svanasana) Backbend with hands and feet on ground, thighs lifted. Consider the Heart opening, arm strength, hip flexor stretch. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Backbend with hands and feet on ground, thighs lifted
practitioner.primaryFocus: Heart opening, arm strength, hip flexor stretch

specificNeeds: Heart opening, arm strength, hip flexor stretch
